parameters.name: ApprovalRules
parameters.description: The rules of scanning and installing patches for the specified operating system.

parameters.name: ApprovedPatchesEnableNonSecurity
parameters.description: Specifies whether the approved patch involves updates other than security-related updates.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the patch baseline.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the patch baseline.

parameters.name: OperationSystem
parameters.description:
The type of the operating system. Valid values:

*   Windows
*   Ubuntu
*   CentOS
*   Debian
*   AliyunLinux
*   RedhatEnterpriseLinux
*   Anolis
*   AlmaLinux

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which you want to create a patch baseline.

parameters.name: RejectedPatchesAction
parameters.description: The action of the rejected patch.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
